goal: generate a response for the user, based on the character profile and the chat history

nodes.name: collect_character_info_node
nodes.description: collect character info from the Internet, or create a new character profile based on user's inputs

inputs.name: character_name
inputs.description: The name of the character to search for or to generate.

inputs.name: character_description
inputs.description: The description of the character to search for or to generate.

inputs.name: chat_history
inputs.description: The chat history between the user and the character.

inputs.name: original_character
inputs.description: Whether the character is original or not.

outputs.name: character_profile
outputs.description: The profile information of the character.

agents.name: search_character_agent
agents.description: An agent to search for a character on the Internet.

prompt_template.instruction: You will be given a character name and a character description, and you need to search for the character on the Internet and return the profile information of the character.
prompt_template.context: The character name is {character_name} and the character description is {character_description}.

inputs.name: character_name
inputs.description: The name of the character to search for.

inputs.name: character_description
inputs.description: The description of the character to search for.

outputs.name: character_profile
outputs.description: The profile information of the character.

agents.system_prompt: You are a helpful assistant that can search for a character on the Internet.

agents.name: generate_character_response_agent
agents.description: An agent to generate a response for the user, based on the character profile and the chat history.

prompt_template.instruction: You will be given a character profile and a chat history, and you need to generate a response for the user.
prompt_template.context: The character profile is {character_profile} and the chat history is {chat_history}.

inputs.name: character_profile
inputs.description: The profile information of the character.

inputs.name: chat_history
inputs.description: The chat history between the user and the character.

agents.system_prompt: You are a helpful assistant that can generate a response for the user.
